00059 class NT_image_o : public NT_o {
00060 public:
00061 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/  
00062 NT_image_o(NTsize width = 128, NTsize height = 64, NTsize colorDepth=16, NTimageDataFormat dataFormat = NT_RGBA);
00063 NT_image_o(const NT_image_o & original);
00064 const NT_image_o & operator= (const NT_image_o & right);
00065 virtual ~NT_image_o();
00066 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00067 NTsize _width()  { return width;}
00068 NTsize _height() { return height;}
00069 NTsize _colorDepth() { return 24;}
00070 NTimageDataFormat _dataFormat() { return dataFormat;}
00071 
00072 NTreturn Load( string filename, NTimageFileType fileType = NT_AUTO);
00073 NTreturn Save( string filename, NTimageFileType fileType = NT_AUTO) const {};
00074 const valarray<NTsize>* GetImageArray() const {return &imageVec;}
00075 //valarray<double>* GetRGBAImageArray() const;
00076 /* ***  Data                 ***/  
00077 protected:
00078 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00079 NTreal _imageVecR( NTsize elementIndex ) const{ return imageVec[elementIndex]/255.0; }
00080 NTsize _imageVecI( NTsize elementIndex ) const{ return imageVec[elementIndex]; }
00081 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00082 NTsize width;
00083 NTsize height;
00084 NTsize colorDepth; /*  in bits per pixel without alpha channel {1,2,4,8,15,16,24,32}; */
00085 NTimageDataFormat dataFormat;
00086 private:
00087 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00088 NTimageFileType Filename2Filetype( string filename );
00089 NTreturn LoadBMP( string filename){cerr << "Not implemented."<<endl;}
00090 NTreturn LoadPPM( string filename){cerr << "Not implemented."<<endl;}
00091 NTreturn LoadTGA( string filename);
00092 /* ***  Data                 ***/ 
00093 valarray<NTsize> imageVec;
00094 };
